## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G18680](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G18680)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PUMPKIN</u>
- **Gene Name:** plastid 55 UMP kinase
- **Description:**   Amino acid kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [pumpkin]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Photobleached seedlings. Delayed growth.
